item.title: Vector Math
item.description: While building games, here are a series of math functions which I found incredibly useful. For the below content to be relevant to Unity, you can find the git submodule below: Math-Utils Table of Contents Vectors Basics of Position & Direction More Fun Things With Direction Direction Relative Of Vectors Vectors represent any object which has a magnitude and a position. Consider the cartesian coordinate system on a 3D plane which is usually denoted by like the following (x, y, z).
